Name: ASN.1
Human-readable?: yes(BER, DER, PER, OER, or custom via ECN)
Supports reference?e: yes(XER, JER, GSER, or custom via ECN)

Name: Common Data Representation (CDR)
Standard API: ADA, C, C++, Java, Cobol, Lisp, Python, Ruby, Smalltalk

Name: Fast Binary Encoding
Standard API: C++, C#, Go, Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, Python, Ruby

Name: FlatBuffers
Standard API: C++, Java, C#, Go, Python, Rust, JavaScript, PHP, C, Dart, Lua, TypeScript

Name: FHIR
Standard API: Hapi for FHIR JSON, XML, Turtle

Name: HOCON
Standard API: yes(native Java API for all JVM languages)

Name: JSON
Binary?: no, but see BSON, Smile, UBJSON

Name: Protocol Buffers (protobuf)
Standard API: C++, C#, Java, Python, Javascript, Go

Name: SCaViS
Standard API: yes(Native Java API, bindings for Jython, JRuby, Groovy and others)

Name: Smile
Standard API: partial(via JSON APIs implemented with Smile backend, on Jackson, Python)

Name: SOAP
Binary?: partial([[Efficient XML Interchange]], [[Binary XML]], [[Fast Infoset]], MTOM, [[XSD]] base64 data)

Name: transit
Standard API: yes  Clojure, Java, Python, Javascript, Ruby, Scala

Name: XML
Binary?: partial([[Efficient XML Interchange]], [[Binary XML]], [[Fast Infoset]], [[XSD]] base64 data)

Name: YAML
Creator-maintainer: Clark Evans,Ingy döt Net,and Oren Ben-Kiki
Based on: C, Java, Perl, Python, Ruby, Email, HTML, MIME, URI, XML, SAX, SOAP, JSON
